Today in the North East, it's looking solid with 5 ft @ 8s ENE swell and light 11 mph N winds. Saltburn Point and Saltburn Beach are prime spots, especially with the tides favoring Saltburn Beach from 08:22 to 16:00. Tomorrow, conditions drop to 3 ft @ 6s ESE with fresh 31 mph S winds, making it poor across the board. Day after, it stays flat at 2 ft @ 6s SE with 21 mph SSW winds. Best: today.
